Dinn: Thanks you! Then keep hunting Pterosaurs, Tyrannosauruses and Velociraptors and collect samples of their tissues. Just so you know, 1 Dinosaur Egg and 150 Dinosaur Tissues can be processed as a set. You can find dinosaur eggs by searching near a dinosaur's lair. But once you touch one, any dinosaurs nearby will rush back to protect the egg! Good luck!
